data.name: Nova-Life: Amboise
data.detailed_description:
Nova-Life is a simulation video game mainly focused on city roleplay in an open world.

THE FIRST FRENCH ROLEPLAY GAME!


In Nova-Life you can create your own character, find a job and go to work to gain money.

The Nova-Life project will have around ten dozen or so jobs in its final version, including the possibility of becoming a self-entrepreneur in order to create your own store, and/or your own company which will offer a wide range of choices in the roleplay.

The roleplay of Nova-Life is a French roleplay, without doubts as we are developing it along, we will add American, German, Russian maps to vary the roleplays but we will also rely on the players of Nova-Life to vary the content with the Steam Workshop!

Features

  • A pleasant driving system
  • Written communication and VO-IP
  • Interact with AI
  • Multiple vehicles

The jobs have a level hierarchy, which allows you to get a rank in your job and therefore increase your salary

Discord TeamNova : https://discord.gg/rqHdcSU (French)

data.short_description: Nova-Life is a 3D video game of sandbox type mainly focused on the roleplay whose goals are to create a character, to find you a job and to play as if you were in real life by putting yourself in the shoes of your character and all that in multiplayer mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64 - x86)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone fortement recommandé
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64 - x86)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 - AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone fortement recommandé

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 and higher/Mint 17.1 x86 and x64/SteamOS Brewmaster
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 and higher/Mint 17.1 x86 and x64/SteamOS Brewmaster
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
